title: Better Bathrooms Infographic - Ur-ine Trouble Now!
content:
Better Bathrooms Trade Scheme Infographic 
  
 (PRWEB UK)  25 September 2015  

Better Bathrooms the UK’s largest independent Bathroom and Tiles retailer, is pleased to announce the official launch of the Trade Loyalty Scheme. To celebrate the launch the retailer has released a fun infographic on strange toilet laws from around the world – some are real and some are urban myths. 
 
To view the infographic click here: https://uk.pinterest.com/pin/245938829629201346/ 
 
The Trade Loyalty Scheme, is free to join and professional traders will be offered the best prices, exclusive deals and earn loyalty bonus rewards. 
 
Designed as a reward scheme, all traders will have access to a team of dedicated Account Managers. All managers have excellent product knowledge and will ensure all orders are processed hassle free and delivered on time. Offering a tailored, personal service, your manager will go that extra mile to ensure everything runs smoothly. 
 
Additional benefits include: 

    Priority Dispatch      Dedicated Delivery Day      Exclusive Trade Deals      Dedicated Web Page advertised to over 5 million customers      Monthly statements  
Award-winning Better Bathrooms, has the largest showrooms across the UK - with over 3,000 products on display in each showroom. By consistently reinvesting company profits to encourage growth, the company has developed into a thriving retail business. Customers can order instore, over the phone or on the hugely successful online store http://www.betterbathrooms.com .
